General.Name: Great Taipei Gas Corp
General.Description: The Great Taipei Gas Corporation supplies natural gas in Taiwan. It also manufactures and supplies gas and related equipment; sells gas appliances; and leases long-distance land cable circuits and office buildings. The company's business area covers seven districts, including Songshan, Xinyi, Daan, Wanhua, Zhongzheng, Datong, and Zhongshan, as well as two counties comprising Fuhua and Ming Sheng in the Shilin district. It serves approximately 380,000 customers. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 35, Guangfu North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 105
